instruction: Create a poem based on the concept of regret and love.
output:
My regretful heart is heavy, my love fleeting and lost
No words I want to whisper, my heart too high a cost
My love was so alluring yet left me feeling blue
For every memory I cherish was shared not just with you

My love was strong and pure, so why did I accept defeat?
My lone regret, now boundless, I must accept and then repeat
Perhaps I should have trusted, should have fought for what was mine
But the regret of what could have been will be engraved on time.
